articles.description: Here, we take a look at the list of three talented Duleep Trophy performers who could make their India debut soon.
articles.content: Duleep Trophy 2023 ended with South Zone defeating West Zone in the final. It was after a few years that zone-based teams played against each other. This added context and perspective to the tourname… [+1509 chars]

articles.title: Sehwag, Gambhir, Yuvraj, Zaheer and I were discarded mysteriously after 2011 World Cup: Harbhajan - Crictoday.com (Cricket News)
articles.description: Former player Harbhajan Singh recently opened up on the mysterious disappearance of the 2011 World Cup winning squad.
articles.content: Harbhajan Singh was one of the best Indian bowlers during his heydays. He recently opened up on the mysterious disappearance of the 2011 World Cup winning squad. The team never played together again … [+803 chars]

articles.description: After the schedule tweak, Pakistan will be playing 19 T20Is between now and the 2024 Men's T20 World Cup
articles.content: Jan 12 - 1st T20I, AucklandJan 14 - 2nd T20I, HamiltonJan 17 - 3rd T20I, DunedinJan 19 - 4th T20I, ChristchurchJan 21 - 5th T20I, Christchurch
